column2:
Dear [Root.GetTitledName],

After your recent...undesirable performance we have decided that you are not fit to remain in [Root.Society.GetName]

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName].

Dear [Root.GetTitledName],

After your recent...undesirable performance we have decided that you are not fit to hold your current rank of [Root.GetSocietyRank].

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName].

Dear [Root.GetTitledName],

Your recent performance has tainted the reputation of [Root.Society.GetName]...don't let it happen again.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName].

Dear [Root.GetTitledName],

After your recent outstanding performance we have decided that you are ready to procede unto the next rank of [Root.Society.GetName]

Sincerely,
[rtp_society_leader.GetTitledName].
I will rank up when ready.
You may receive a warning, lose a rank, or be kicked out from the society!
Did NOT get kicked out from this society.
